ch.unibe.iam.graph
Interface Attributable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Attributes, GraphElement
public interface Attributable

This interface defines a common API for attributable objects (e.g. graph elements).

Version:
$Revision: 1.10 $ $Date: 2002/10/24 17:07:18 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger

Method Summary
 java.util.Iterator attributes()
          Returns an iterator over all attributes stored in this object.
 java.lang.Object getAttribute(java.lang.String pAttrID)
          Gets the attribute with ID pAttrID of this object if available.
 java.util.Map getAttributes()
          Gets all attributes of this graph element.
 boolean hasAttributes()
          Returns true if there are attributes attached to this object, else false is returned.
 java.lang.Object removeAttribute(java.lang.String pAttrID)
          Removes the attribute with ID pAttrID from this object.
 void removeAttributes()
          Removes all attributes from this object.
 java.lang.Object setAttribute(java.lang.String pAttrID, java.lang.Object pValue)
          Sets the attribute with ID pAttrID of this object to pValue.
 java.util.Map setAttributes(java.util.Map pAttributesMap)
          Sets the map containing the attributes of this graph element to the specified map.
 int sizeAttributes()
          Returns the number of attributes attached to this object.
